Original title: Debiru mei kurai
Year: 2007
Distributor: Selecta Vision
Number of Discs: 3
Region: 2
Video: Pal 16:9
Audio: Dolby Digital 5.1: Spanish, Japanese.
Subtitles: Spanish
Moral Rating: 13

Synopsis:

His name is Dante and the best in their work: to hunt demons. As a small business owner Devil May Cry, his perpetual debts forced him to accept all types of missions. But once hired, his twin pistols, Ebony and Ivory, and your deadly sword Rebellion, never forgive. In fact, he is half-human half-demon with a legacy as the son of the Dark Knight Sparda, a demon that two thousand years ago betrayed his people to give an opportunity for the human race. To carry out the mission for which he was born, Dante has the support, and sometimes the hassle-Lady, a manipulative and unscrupulous colleague, and Trish, a former colleague created demonic image of his mother.
